quotes.quote: You have the power to turn your struggles into stepping stones.
Know that deep inside, you are resilient, brave, and so much stronger and more powerful than your fears.
In the face of adversity, your resilience shines bright.
You are stronger than your struggles.
Stay positive, your hard work will pay off.
Your determination will lead you to success.
Each step forward, no matter how small, is a victory of resilience.
Every challenge you face is an opportunity to prove your resilience.
Trust yourself and your resilience. You've got this.
Your strength lies in your ability to rise above every challenge.
Resilience is the silent force that propels you forward.
You are more resilient than you realize.
Stay positive, you are doing amazing.
Change your self-talk. Remind yourself that you are strong and resilient and can handle anything that comes your way.
Your resilience is a light that never dims, no matter the darkness.
You are strong. You are beautiful. You are resilient.
In every trial, there is a triumph waiting to be claimed by your resilient heart.
Even if things don't get better, you will. You'll get stronger, braver, and more resilient. Never forget that you're a warrior.
In order to succeed, people need a sense of self-efficacy, to struggle together with resilience to meet the inevitable obstacles and inequities of life.
quotes.author: Albert Bandura

quotes.quote: You have the heart of a lion and the resilience to match.
The only way to set yourself free is to meet each new challenge resiliently.
When you feel like giving up, remember why you held on for so long in the first place.
You have the power to overcome anything.
Ships don't sink because of the water around them; ships sink because of the water that gets in them. Don't let what's happening around you get inside you and weigh you down.
In every trial, there is a triumph waiting to be claimed by your resilience.
Keep going, for your resilience is paving the way to your dreams.
Stay positive, even in the darkest times.
We are stronger, gentler, more resilient, and more beautiful than any of us imagine.
quotes.author: Mark Nepo

quotes.quote: Your resilience is your greatest asset.
Life doesn't get easier or more forgiving, we get stronger and more resilient.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli
